channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The drainage pipe in the storm drain has collapsed. It no longer drains and floods into my property, damaging my driveway., 3rd February
item.description:
A team visited last July and inspected the drain with a camera. They told me the drain pipe had collapsed and they would need to repair it. I have not heard anything since then, and the problem continues to worsen. It is damaging my property and must be fixed urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Yew Tree Close, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 3rd February
item.description:
Once again coming to work up Leckhampton Hill as I refused to come from Birdlip due to the damage to my tyre and alloy caused from guess what a pothole last week!!!! and here I am now on a second trye claim, where I have previously reported back last year the same huge pothole that smashes your car if you go into it which you have no choice otherwise you will be hitting on coming traffic!! this is an absolute disgrace this road!! this was filled in from my last claim with cheap material bodged and patched which has all come away, you should be investigated for fraud! you say travellers rip off people with there cheap tarmac, you must go to the same place to buy the cheapest thinest tarmac!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo, 3rd February
item.description:
Reported yesterday got an email saying fixed but was not as my son came out of school and stepped in the exact bit that id reported that morning. Very disappointing. In the corner of house number 41 GL33HS on the pavement is dog poo and between numbers 45-47 the pavement by the bushes still there. Further on down that pavement is just lots of mud its disgusting and needs a good clean, its unfair do the kids going into school. The dog poo round this area is diabolical.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive potholes all the way down North Road West, 3rd February
item.description:
As usual the repairs were rubbish in North Road West....there are potholes all the way down this road. And the sides of the road is disintegrating day by day. The whole road is just full of holes mainly due to shoddy workmanship in the past. The road needs shutting completely and the whole road needs resurfacing from top to bottom and from side to side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Road West, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole getting deeper right by the pedestrian zebra crossing walk, 3rd February
item.description:
I see your inspector says there is no danger!!,,,how come? Drivers are swerving around this road collapse directly on to the zebra crossing where people may have started to cross over.This problem should be repaired immediately or someone is going to get injured
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
